content.question: The growth of activism by religious conservatives in the second half of the twentieth century occurred most directly in response to the

choices.label: challenging of social norms by youth movements
enactment of New Deal policies meant to address poverty
discovery of environmental damage caused by industrial production
expansion of the military budget as a result of intervention in Vietnam

content.answer: challenging of social norms by youth movements

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
